greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: E.g.f.: exp(arcsin(tanh(x))).
formula: a(n) = (-i)^n * Z(n,i), where i = sqrt(-1) and Z(n,x) denotes the n-th zigzag polynomial as described in A147309. Alternative form of the egf: {sec(i*x) - tan(i*x)}^i. - _Peter Bala_, Jan 26 2011

a(n)=sum(m=1..n, sum(r=m..n, (sum(k=r..n, (-1)^((3*k)/2)*(sum(i=0..k, (2^i*stirling1(m+i,m)* binomial(m+k-1,m+i-1))/(m+i)!))*binomial((r-2)/2,(r-m-k)/2)))*((-1)^(r-m)+1)*sum(k=0..r-m, binomial(k-1,r-1)*k!*2^(n-k)*stirling2(n,k)*(-1)^(r+k))))/2, n>0, a(0)=1. - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Jun 09 2011
a(n) = sum(i=0..n-1, binomial(n-1,i)*euler(i)*a(n-i-1)), a(0)=1. - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Feb 26 2015
mathematica: a[0] = 1; a[n_] := a[n] = Sum[Binomial[n-1, i]*EulerE[i]*a[n-i-1], {i, 0, n-1}]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 22}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 22 2017, after _Vladimir Kruchinin_ *)
program: a(n):=if n=0 then 1 else sum(binomial(n-1,i)*euler(i)*a(n-i-1),i,0,n-1); /* _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Feb 26 2015 */
results.author: Patrick Demichel (patrick.demichel(AT)hp.com)
